attributes.action: Nominate Stephen Christopher Lennon AKA "Tommy Robinson" for services to the UK.
attributes.background:
This petition calls upon the British Government to recognize the tireless work by Stephen Christopher Lennon AKA "Tommy Robinson" for services to the nation & her people.

The Prime Minister & government has the option & ability to nominate an individual for inclusion in the biannual honors list.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because it asks for someone to be nominated for an honour. 

Members of the public can nominate people for honours directly. You can find out how to nominate someone for an honour here:

https://www.gov.uk/honours
